title: Indo-US Joint Military Exercise Shared as ‘Encounter in Kashmir’
subtitle: Live Encounter in Kashmir Viral Video Fact Check: Now a video which shows Army men carrying out a cordon and search operation in a village is being circulated on Twitter and Youtube with a claim that the visuals show ‘Live encounter in Kashmir’.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
The Centre revoked Article 370, which gives a special status to Jammu and Kashmir on Monday, 5 August, through a Presidential Order. Home Minister Amit Shah has also moved a Bill to bifurcate the state into two union territories – Jammu & Kashmir as one and Ladakh as the other.

The revocation of Article 370 drew sharp criticism from leaders, with Vice President of National Conference and former J&K CM Omar Abdullah saying that the move will have “far-reaching and dangerous consequences.”
